text: Chantal Bourragué (born 3 March 1946 in Angoulême, Charente) is a member of the National Assembly of France. She represents the first constituency of the Gironde department and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:People from Angoulême Category:University of Bordeaux alumni Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians Category:Politicians from Nouvelle-Aquitaine
title: Chantal Bourragué
